resources.string:
To pair with the %s device,do as the following:

1.Follow the device instructions to add it to the %s app.

2.Ensure that the network used during the device setup is on the same local area network (LAN) as the panel.
To pair with the %s device,do as the following:\n\nEnsure that the Wi-Fi network used during the device setup is on the same local area network (LAN) as the panel.
Are you sure you want to delete this device? This sub-device will be removed and the gateway may not be able to re-add it.
The scene name cannot be empty.
Please use at least one trigger.
Please use at least one task.
General users do not have permission to perform this operation, please contact the administrator user
The cloud admin account could not be found. Please try again or create a new account.
